tool_description: An API showing the latest News Headlines all around the world
name: Latest Breaking News Live
title: Latest Breaking News Live

api_list.name: Get all the latest news
api_list.description: This endpoint  will  return back all latest news from around the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/latest-breaking-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get individual news sources
api_list.description: Get latest breaking news from specific news sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/latest-breaking-news/skynews"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com/latest-breaking-news/{sitesourceid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "latest-breaking-news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
